string-array.name: faq_questions
string-array.item: How to set time limit for an app?
Does the app work in background?
Can I set time for multiple apps?

string-array.name: faq_answers
string-array.item: You can set a timer by tapping "Setup" in the Timer tab, then select the app and the desired time.
Yes, the app continues counting down even if you don\'t open it. You must enable accessibility permission.
The free version supports only 1 app. Upgrade to Premium to use multiple apps.
Go to Profile > Settings > turn on Notifications. Make sure you allow notification permission in system settings.
Please check if you have granted accessibility permission in Settings > Accessibility. This is required for the app to work.
All data is stored locally on your device. We do not collect or store your personal data on our server.
You can uninstall and reinstall the app, or contact us via the Feedback tab for support.
Premium includes: unlimited apps, detailed statistics, no ads, and many more features.
